DOC.brief_summary: Allogenic adipose derive mesenchymal stem cell injected patient newly diagnose type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.brief_title: Use Stem Cells Diabetes Mellitus Type 1
DOC.detailed_description: Adipose derive mesenchymal stem cell ( ASCs ) collect blood group O donor , cell passaged passage 5 . Before release sample subject release criterion include : test bacterial fungal growth well endotoxin mycoplasma . All test must negative . In addition cell count viability ( must 80 % ) do release . Surface marker documentation do cell release use flow cytometry . The cell infuse within 2 hour release . The dose repeat 6 month total two dos patient . Tests follow one week 12 , 24 36 study stop . These cell inject intravenously patient newly diagnose type 1 Diabetes Mellitus .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult Patients Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus . 2 . Age 18 year 35 year either gender . 3 . Duration disease : exceed 3 year unless Cpeptide le 0.5 ng/ml 4 . CPeptide inclusion base line le 0.5 ng/ml 5 . No clinical evidence renal , retinal , vascular skin complication 6 . Body Mass Index exceed 30 7 . Any HbA1c 8 . At least one positive antibody either antiGlutamic Acid Decarboxylase65 InsulinomaAssociated2 Autoantibodies ( anti1A2 ) 9 . Informed Consent patient 1 . Age le 18 year 35 year 2 . Pregnancy 3 . Married woman woman expect married within study period 4 . History allergy , Cancer , bronchial asthma , liver disease hepatitis 5 . Diabetic coma precoma current recent within last 2 month 6 . CPeptide le 0.5 ng/ml 7 . Disease duration 3 yr . 8 . Complication mention 5 inclusion 9 . Nonconsenting patient withdrawal consent . 10 . Bleeding disorder
